message.content:
Since $(x + 2)(3x^2 - x + 5) = Ax^3 + Bx^2 + Cx + D$,
\[3x^2 - x + 5 = Ax^2 + (A + 3)x + 2A + 5.\]Comparing coefficients, we get
\begin{align*}
A + 3 &= -1, \\
2A + 5 &= 5, \\
2A &= 0.
\end{align*}Hence, $A = 0.$  Then $B = 3,$ $C = -1,$ and $D = 5,$ so $A + B + C + D = \boxed{7}.$
